title.en: A Prayer to Jowo Rinpoche Combined with Aspirations and a Means to Receive the Four Empowerments

text.en: Victorious one, sun-like lord of sages,
text.en-trans: gyalwa tubwang nyinché ni

text.en: Light for this world of Patient Endurance,
text.en-trans: mi jé zhing gi drönma té

text.en: Emanating to tame the land of Jambudvīpa—
text.en-trans: trulpé dzambü ling dülwa

text.en: In you I take refuge, from the very depths of my heart.
text.en-trans: gang la nying né kyab su chi

text.en: Your body is the saṅgha, endowed with knowledge and liberation,
text.en-trans: khyö ku rig drol nyi den té

text.en: Your speech is the Dharma, true cessation and the path,
text.en-trans: sung ni gok lam den nyi chö

text.en: Your mind the face of dharmakāya, unsurpassed—
text.en-trans: tuk ni lama chö kü zhal

text.en: To you, who embody an ocean-like infinity of maṇḍalas,
text.en-trans: kyil khor gyamtsö daknyi la

text.en: I continually make offerings of sevenfold purity,
text.en-trans: namdak dün dang chab chik tu

text.en: Together with my own body and possessions.
text.en-trans: lü dang longchö tö mé bül

text.en: Whatever I see of karma’s influence and power,
text.en-trans: lé kyi zhen wang chi tong yang

text.en: I maintain my commitment: to place my trust in you.
text.en-trans: khyé shé damcha tenpo dzin

text.en: Now that I behold your perfect face,
text.en-trans: khyö zhal tongwé mö nyi la

text.en: And feel intense, overpowering devotion,
text.en-trans: mö gü zö lak mépa dé

text.en: As the very essence of the vase empowerment,
text.en-trans: bumpé wang gi ngowo nyi

text.en: Inspire me to purify bodily obscurations
text.en-trans: lü drip dak né ku dorjé

text.en: And attain the vajra body here and now!
text.en-trans: data nyi du chin gyi lop

text.en: Your speech transcends ordinary words and language—
text.en-trans: khyö sung dra tsik rang tsen lé

text.en: As the empowerment of the perfect secret
text.en-trans: dépa sangwa dampé wang

text.en: Infuses my own speech, in this very instant,
text.en-trans: dak gi ngak la zhukpé mö

text.en: Grant me the attainment of vajra speech!
text.en-trans: sung gi dorjé ngödrup tsol

text.en: Your mind is profound, peaceful, free from concepts:
text.en-trans: tuk ni zab zhi trö dang dral

text.en: May the wisdom empowerment of awakening through great bliss
text.en-trans: dechen changchub sherab wang

text.en: Merge with my own eight types of consciousness,
text.en-trans: dak gi namshé tsok gyé la

text.en: Transforming them into vajra-like enlightened mind.
text.en-trans: dré né tuk kyi dorjer tsol

text.en: Through the supreme empowerment of great light-rays,
text.en-trans: gyalwé dzöpu lé kyépé

text.en: Emerging from theurṇacircle between your brows,
text.en-trans: özer chenpö wang chok gi

text.en: May all that obscures the knowable be cast aside,
text.en-trans: shejé dribpa rab pang né

text.en: And may I reach the stage of Universal Radiance!
text.en-trans: kuntu ö kyi sa nön shok

text.en: Even if they should revile and abuse me,
text.en-trans: dak la mö dam shé yang rung

text.en: May I recognize all beings as my very own parents,
text.en-trans: semchen pamé rang zhin la

text.en: And, through the compassion of repaying their past kindness,
text.en-trans: chépa zowé nyingjé yi

text.en: May I empty saṃsāra from its very depths!
text.en-trans: khorwa dong né trukpar shok
